attributes.action: Dissolve parliament & elect a Catholic monarch
attributes.additional_details: It sems that we have a society totaly tollerant to anything apart from religion, especially the Catholic religion. The Catholic religion is our native culture, in days gone by it had been used to justify revenge, lust & greed. But when used in it's original form, it like all other religions are peaceful & teach the ideals that most people desire. It does not promote greed or killing (abortion) to obtain profit, it recognises that bad acts harm everyone in the society.
